decks.notes: This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on quickly bringing out powerful creatures like Cecil, Dark Knight and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes control elements like Heartless Act and Spell Pierce to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Floodpits Drowner and Spyglass Siren provide additional aggression and disruption. Multiversal Passage helps to fix mana, while cards like Enduring Curiosity and Tishana's Tidebinder offer card draw and utility. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain tempo throughout the game to secure a fast victory.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to establish a fast-paced aggressive strategy through efficient mana ramp with cards like Llanowar Elves and Hushwood Verge, while also utilizing powerful creatures such as Badgermole Cub and Earthbender Ascension to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Fabled Passage and Esper Origins to ensure consistency in mana base and card draw, allowing for a continuous stream of threats. Overall, the goal is to maintain pressure on the opponent and push for a quick victory.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost creatures and spells with the potential to deal damage quickly and efficiently. It utilizes a mix of elemental spells and creatures with abilities to control the board, disrupt opponent's strategy, and apply pressure to the opponent. The deck's main goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced aggressive strategy, leveraging the interaction between spells and creatures to maintain tempo advantage and push for a quick victory.

This deck is focused on building a strong board presence early in the game and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures. It includes mana acceleration with cards like Llanowar Elves and Fabled Passage to quickly ramp up to bigger threats like Colossal Rattlewurm and Lumbering Worldwagon. The deck also includes synergy cards like Hushwood Verge and Esper Origins to help maintain control of the battlefield. By combining efficient creatures and support cards, this deck aims to put constant pressure on the opponent and close out games quickly.

The main focus of this deck is to control the opponent's board through a combination of removal spells and card draw. Utilizing cards like Abandon Attachments and Boomerang Basics, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while building card advantage with Accumulate Wisdom and Artist's Talent. The inclusion of Iroh's Demonstration and Ral, Crackling Wit provides additional control and card advantage. By carefully managing resources and strategically using cards like Firebending Lesson and Stormchaser's Talent, the deck aims to outlast and outmaneuver opponents in a slow and methodical manner.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent with aggressive red creatures and direct damage burn spells. The key strategy is to play aggressively from the beginning to pressure the opponent and finish the game quickly before they have a chance to stabilize. The key cards in the deck are Nova Hellkite and Ojer Axonil, Deepest Might, along with efficient burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike. The deck aims to control the battlefield early on and close out the game with a combination of spells and powerful creatures.

The main focus of this Aggro Red Deck Wins archetype is to consistently apply pressure to the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and burn spells. The deck seeks to quickly reduce the opponent's life total through aggressive attacks and direct damage spells, while maintaining board control with creatures like Scalding Viper and Burnout Bashtronaut. Supporting cards like Fear of Missing Out and Quantum Riddler help to maintain card advantage and allow the deck to maintain its aggressive momentum throughout the match.

The deck focuses on using a combination of cards to quickly bring powerful creatures back from the graveyard onto the battlefield, overwhelming the opponent with a steady stream of threats. By utilizing reanimation spells like Awaken the Honored Dead and Underground Mortuary, along with powerful creatures like Overlord of the Balemurk and Bringer of the Last Gift, the deck aims to establish a dominant board presence and secure victory through sheer force. The deck also includes support cards like Bitter Triumph and Blooming Marsh to help facilitate the combo strategy.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures combined with disruptive spells to control the board and maintain pressure on the opponent. It aims to quickly build a threatening board presence while disrupting the opponent's game plan with removal spells and counter magic. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of evasive creatures and versatile spells, creating a fast-paced and unpredictable gameplay experience. By combining aggression with disruption, this deck aims to dictate the flow of the game and secure a swift victory.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes cards like Torch the Tower and Duelist of the Mind to deal damage early on, while also having control elements like Fear of Missing Out and Frostcliff Siege to maintain board presence. Kaito, Cunning Infiltrator and Winternight Stories provide additional versatility and card advantage. The deck aims to be fast and efficient, using a combination of direct damage and creature threats to pressure the opponent and secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells in the Selesnya color combination. By utilizing cards like Llanowar Elves and Earthbender Ascension, you can generate mana quickly to play large threats like Sire of Seven Deaths and Ugin, Eye of the Storms. Furthermore, cards like Mightform Harmonizer and Badgermole Cub provide additional support and synergies to help maintain pressure on your opponent. With a focus on speed and efficiency, this deck aims to establish dominance on the battlefield and secure victory before the opponent can react effectively.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells in order to control the board and deal damage quickly. By utilizing creatures like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, as well as spells like Heartless Act and Shoot the Sheriff, the deck aims to keep the pressure on the opponent while also protecting its own resources. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Multiversal Passage and Phantom Interference provides flexibility and versatility in the deck's strategy, allowing for various tactics to be employed depending on the situation.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. It utilizes cards like Stormchaser's Talent and Artist's Talent to generate card advantage and power up its spells. Monument to Endurance provides additional card draw, while Combustion Technique and Firebending Lesson serve as removal options. The deck also includes some bounce spells like Boomerang Basics and Gran-Gran to further control the board. Overall, the goal is to outvalue the opponent and maintain control of the game until victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing Aang and other Airbender cards to create a powerful combo that allows for strong control and evasion tactics. By using cards like Airbender Ascension and Floodfarm Verge, players can quickly build up their board presence and overwhelm their opponents. Doc Aurlock, Grizzled Genius and Werefox Bodyguard provide support and protection for the main combo pieces. The deck also includes cards like Multiversal Passage and Meticulous Archive to search for key pieces and maintain card advantage. With this strategy, players aim to outlast and outmaneuver their opponents to secure victory.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of card draw, removal spells, and counter spells. It aims to maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's strategy by bouncing their key threats back to their hand, while also generating card advantage through spells like "Abandon Attachments" and "Artist's Talent". The deck utilizes powerful control cards such as "Iroh's Demonstration" and "Combustion Technique" to maintain tempo and protect its important permanents. Additionally, it aims to outvalue opponents with cards like "Gran-Gran" and "Firebending Lesson", while also having access to a versatile win condition in "Ral, Crackling Wit".

The main concept of this Jeskai Control deck is to maintain control over the game through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and card draw. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while advancing its own through efficient removal like Lightning Helix and board wipes like Day of Judgment. Consult the Star Charts and Meticulous Archive are used for card advantage and selection, while Jeskai Revelation and Stock Up provide card draw. Rest in Peace helps with graveyard hate, and Marang River Regent offers a win condition. Overall, the deck focuses on controlling the board and outvaluing the opponent.
